item.title: Secrets of Defcon: Untold Stories From the World's Greatest Hacker Conference ðŸ’¾ Ep.157: Grifter
item.author: Jack Rhysider
item.content:encoded:
Grifter grew up in a tough neighborhood. All he knew was fighting and stealing. But when he discovered a hacker BBS, he turned his life of street crime into one of cyber crime. But it wasn't until he went to Defcon in Las Vegas that he truly leveled up.
Visit https://darknetdiaries.com/episode/157/ for a list of sources, full transcripts, and to listen to all episodes.
